entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is introduced as one of Mr. Weasley's sons, but later corrected to George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is introduced as one of Mr. Weasley's sons, and later confirmed as the correct name after an initial mistake.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is introduced as one of Mr. Weasley's sons.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is introduced as one of Mr. Weasley's sons.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as one of Mr. Weasley's friends, and later confirmed to be his son.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is introduced as Mr. Weasley's daughter.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is introduced as Ron's friend and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as Ron's friend and a student at Hogwarts, and Bagman shows a reaction to his name.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is introduced as someone who has helped the Weasleys get good tickets for the match, and he is described as beaming with pride.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is introduced as the host of the gathering, and he introduces his family members to Bagman.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley is introduced as the parent of Fred, and later corrected to George.
Mr. Weasley is introduced as the parent of George, after an initial mistake with Fred's name.
Mr. Weasley is introduced as the parent of Bill.
Mr. Weasley is introduced as the parent of Charlie.
Mr. Weasley is introduced as the parent of Ron, and later confirmed to be his son after an initial introduction as a friend.
Mr. Weasley is introduced as the parent of Ginny.
Ron is introduced as a friend of Hermione Granger, and they are both students at Hogwarts.
Ron is introduced as a friend of Harry Potter, and they are both students at Hogwarts.
Ludo Bagman is introduced as someone who has helped the Weasleys get good tickets for the match, and he is described as beaming with pride when meeting Mr. Weasley.
